name: Defeat the Boss
description:
Defeat that creature by stabbing him in the back 3 times, within 30 seconds.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys - Movement

Space bar - Dash forward

R - Restart

Tips:

- As long as the tip of the sword hit the creature's back, it'll be consider a "stab"

- Stabbing the creature from other direction will caused deflect, and move player backwards
